prompts.title: Anime courier rooftop run (10s, 9:16)
prompts.prompt: Anime-style vertical shot of a teen courier sprinting across neon rooftops at dusk, 10s, 9:16. Camera tracks beside them as holographic billboards whoosh past, smear-frame trails on fast limbs, soft parallax clouds, no logos, no on-screen text.

prompts.title: Pixel wizard loop (5s, 1:1)
prompts.prompt: 5s seamless pixel-art loop of a tiny wizard stirring a glowing cauldron in a cozy 1:1 cottage interior. Camera locked medium shot. Bubbles rise in a repeating pattern, books float gently, warm candlelight, chunky retro pixels, no text or logos.

faqs.a: No. Pika 2.2 in MaxVideoAI always outputs silent clips. Add sound in post or use an audio-capable engine when needed.

faqs.q: Which duration should I use: 5 or 10 seconds?
faqs.a: 5s for punchy hooks and quick loops; 10s when you need a bit more room for build-up or parallax.
Yes. Choose 9:16 for TikTok, Reels, Shorts and Stories; keep the subject centered for safe crops.

faqs.q: How do seeds and negative prompts help?
faqs.a: Reuse a seed to keep iterations related; use negative prompts to block text/logos/extra characters/watermarks.

faqs.q: When should I use another engine instead?
faqs.a: For photoreal people/products or native audio, use Sora 2 or Veo 3.1; for sound-ready short clips, consider Wan 2.5.

promptingTabNotes.quick: Quick = variations. Use for fast iteration.
promptingTabNotes.structured: Structured = consistency. Use when you need reliable results.
promptingTabNotes.pro: Pro = style control. Use for precise, repeatable looks.

promptingTabs.label: Quick
promptingTabs.title: Quick prompt (fast iteration)
promptingTabs.description: Use 1–2 sentences when you want variations.

promptingTabs.label: Structured
promptingTabs.title: Structured prompt (best for reliable results)
promptingTabs.description: Separate information so the model can follow it consistently.
promptingTabs.copy:
Subject:
[Who/what + 1 clear action or pose.]

Setting:
[Where + time of day + 2–3 visual anchors.]

Composition:
- Framing: [wide / medium / close-up]
- Angle: [eye-level / low / high]
- Lens feel: [e.g., 35mm natural, shallow DOF]

Lighting + palette:
[Key light + 2–3 palette anchors]

Style constraints:
No logos. No readable text. Clean background.

promptingTabs.label: Pro
promptingTabs.title: Pro prompt (ultra-specific "studio brief")
promptingTabs.description: Use this when you need a very specific look or continuity across shots.
promptingTabs.copy:
Project / intent:
[One-line goal for the still.]

Subject:
[Who/what + wardrobe/materials + 2–3 distinctive traits.]

Location / set:
[Where + time of day + weather. Add 3 visual anchors.]

Composition:
- Framing + angle
- Lens feel + depth of field
- Look: [clean digital / subtle film grain / soft bloom]

Lighting & grade:
- Key light
- Contrast
- Palette anchors (3–5)

Constraints:
No logos. No readable text. No overlays.
